source.sqlReaderQuery:
select top 100 pac_reg as CD_PESSOA_FISICA, 
pac_nome AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA, 
pac_numcpf AS NR_CPF, 
convert(char(10),pac_nasc,121) as DT_NASCIMENTO, 
pac_fone AS NR_TELEFONE_CELULAR,
pac_fone2 AS NR_TELEFONE, 
emp_cgc as CNPJ ,
EMP_NOME_FANTASIA as SIGLA_UNIDADE,
EMP_RAZ_SOC as MARCA,
pac_pront as NR_PRONTUARIO,
pac_dreg as DT_CADASTRO_ORIGINAL
from pac,
usr,
str,
emp
where PAC_USR_LOGIN_CAD = USR_LOGIN
and USR_STR_COD = str_cod
and STR_EMP_COD = EMP_COD

select top 100
pac_reg as CD_PESSOA_FISICA,
pac_nome as NM_PESSOA_FISICA,
convert(date,osm_dthr) as DT_ENTRADA,
osm_dthr as HR_ENTRADA,
psv_nome as NM_MEDICO,
osm_cnv as CD_CONVENIO,
cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,
convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_ATENDIMENTO,
emp_cgc AS CNPJ,
emp_nome_fantasia as SIGLA_UNIDADE,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as CD_PROCEDENCIA,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as DS_PROCEDENCIA,
'NAO ENCONTRADO' as ID,

DAY(osm_dthr) as DIA,
MONTH(osm_dthr) as MES, 
YEAR(osm_dthr) as ANO,

OSM_USR_LOGIN_CAD

from osm, pac, cnv, str,  psv, emp
where osm_pac = pac_reg
and osm_cnv = cnv_cod
and osm_str = str_cod
and case when str_emp_cod is null then 1 end = emp_cod
and osm_mreq = psv_cod

-- Construção tabela agenda Smart

select top 10
AGM_PAC as CD_PESSOA_FISICA, 
agm.agm_cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO,
GCC_DESCR,
CONVERT(DATE,AGM_HINI) AS DATA_AGENDA,
CONVERT(TIME,AGM_HINI) AS HORA_AGENDA,
AGM_ATEND,
pac.PAC_NOME,
SMK_NOME AS DS_PROCEDIMENTO,
' ' DS_PROCED_ADICIONAL,
1 AS IE_QUANTIDADE,
USR_NOME as NM_USUARIO,
psv_nome AS NM_MEDICO,
AGM_STR_COD as SIGLA_UNIDADE,
AGM_STR_COD as MARCA,
CASE WHEN AGM_STAT = 'A' then 'Aberta'
     WHEN AGM_STAT = 'E' then 'Executada'      
     WHEN AGM_STAT = 'C' then 'Cancelada'     
     WHEN AGM_STAT = 'B' then 'Bloqueada' END STATUS_AGENDA,

convert(varchar,AGM_OSM_SERIE) + convert(varchar,AGM_OSM_NUM) as NR_ATENDIMENTO,
AGM_num as NR_SEQUENCIA,
''ID,
'' as CD_PROCEDENCIA,
agm_proc as DS_PROCEDENCIA ,
agm.AGM_DTMRC,
DAY(AGM_HINI) as DIA,
MONTH(AGM_HINI) as MES,
YEAR(AGM_HINI) as ANO,
' ' ds_classificacao,
' ' ds_agrupamento,
agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_COD,
agm.AGM_CANC_MOT_TIPO,
agm_med as CD_AGENDA
from 
agm, 
pac,
cnv,
str,
smk,
gcc,
usr,
psv
where agm.agm_pac = pac_reg
and agm_cnv_cod = cnv_cod
and agm_str_cod = str_cod
and agm_smk = smk_cod
and agm_str_cod = gcc_str_cod
and AGM_USR_LOGIN = USR_LOGIN
and agm_med = PSV_COD
